question:
Which of the following is equal to \(\frac{-1}{2x} - \frac{1}{4y} + \frac{1}{xy} + \frac{1}{8}\) ?
A. \(\frac{(x-4)(2-y)}{8xy}\)
B. \(\frac{(x-2)(y-4)}{8xy}\)
C. \(\frac{(x-4)(y-2)}{8xy}\)
D. \(\frac{(x+2)(4-y)}{8xy}\)
E. \(\frac{(x-2)(4-y)}{8xy}\)
Show
Hide
